Class FoodItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • FoodItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item

    public class FoodItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item
    FoodItem is the class to represent an Item that can be eaten
    Since:
    12/21/2020
    Author:
    Bennett Forkner

      private int price
      The price of this FoodItem if it is in a store

        public FoodItem(int medianHPGain,
                java.lang.String foodName,

        The constructor for a FoodItem
        Parameters:
        medianHPGain - The middle value of the range of possible amounts of health points that can be restored by eating this FoodItem
        foodName - The name of the FoodItem
        price - The price of this FoodItem in a store
